title: first strike borders
body: if i buy project zed in hectevh crafting i can get the first strike border for him?

replies.body: Project Zed is part of a previous project, and won't be eligible for a first strike border through this even.  Project Yasuo is the only exception, and players can get that first strike border by obtaining that skin before this project disruption event ends.  Reason for that is because Project Yasuo is the first project skin, and previously didn't have a first strike border.  Hope that helps!
